EmailTemplate.name: 18-Util Crit Comms-Util Architecture-Email-S1-Head Netk Comm-T003IH.Email 2 Camp
EmailTemplate.subject: Communications for an agile, efficient grid that's ready for any new demand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Build a communications network that’s ready for tomorrow’s energy challenges Digital technologies are creating powerful opportunities for the energy sector. To capitalize, you need a network that intelligently connects your people, systems and processes. Learn how <[[https://networks.nokia.com/empowered?did=d000000001hr&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email2-empoweredhub&utm_term=power-util#opportunities]]> the Nokia Bell Labs Future X architecture for power utilities can help you capture new opportunities by using IoT, mobility, cloud and analytics technologies to achieve new levels of performance, security and efficiency.
© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
